title: Freedom of Movement
content:
Freedom of Movement Level 4 Abjuration Spell Snap an ally out of any Stun. Difficult Terrain can't slow them down, and they can't be magically Paralysed or Restrained. If the target is Restrained by non-magical means, it can spend 1.5m of movement to free itself. Until Long Rest Melee Action Level 4 Spell Slot
